all_text_timv: The fire next time [videorecording] : a town divided by conflict-- would you take a stand? / produced, directed and written by Patrice O'Neill ; a production of the Working Group ;  Independent Television Services. [United States] : Docurama, [2005] [United States] : Distributed by New Video. ©2005 1 videodisc (approximately 86 min.) : sound, color ; 4 3/4 in. two-dimensional moving image tdi rdacontent video v rdamedia videodisc vd rdacarrier Title from disc surface. "POV presents"--Container. Special features: filmmaker interviews, filmmaker biography, interactive menus, scene selection. Director of photography, Blake McHugh ; editor, Linda Peckham. This documentary is a nuanced portrait of the Flathead Valley community trying to deal with deep-seated conflict in the face of rapid change and growth. DVD, NTSC, Dolby Digital stereo. No public performance rights. Classroom instruction and home use permitted. Cities and towns Montana Flathead River Valley Growth. Social conflict Montana Flathead River Valley.
